name: Get Up (FreakyFeet)
description:
You can only jump and use power ups. Now go collect the stars and reach the goal.

Based on an idea I had for an endless climber aimed at handheld devices. The art theme I then had in mind were a lot different, but because of time limitations I chose to go with something more simplistic. The art is inspired by Thomas was alone.

Originally I wanted an endless level, but I was unsure of how to procedurally create a level that would both become harder and still be doable the higher you would reach. Thus I made short levels instead and added a total of 16 levels. Also, the original idea was supposed to be called Bean Up which would be about a delinquent bean who needed to climb up in order to mature and avoid coffee grinders and stuff.
